name: Tiny Olto
description:
help olto and friends, to run through a forest filled with different kinds of enemies.

your only ally is a typical bomb that you can use to destroy the enemies, but be careful, they're costly and needs to purchased before you can throw them. the pocket is tiny and can only carry so much, so you'll have to return back to store to buy more. Every purchase of in game items is done by the coins you collect during gameplay, there's no need to spend any real money, in fact, the game does not even have any purchasable content. no ads either.
